alert.note: Alert for Calaveras; San Joaquin; Stanislaus; Tuolumne (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 11 at 2:23PM PST until March 11 at 2:45PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM PST FOR WEST CENTRAL TUOLUMNE...EAST CENTRAL SAN JOAQUIN...NORTHERN STANISLAUS AND SOUTHWESTERN CALAVERAS COUNTIES... At 220 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Copperopolis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...There was a public report of quarter sized hail in Stockton. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Sonora, San Andreas, Carson Hill, Tuttletown, Vallecito, Copper Cove Village, Springfield, Telegraph City, Angels City, Milton, Avery, Hodson, Forest Meadows, Copperopolis, Mountain Ranch, Rancho Calaveras, Angels Camp, Tuolumne City, and Murphys. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
